seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching services: one-to-one coaching, small-group clinics, and organisational partnerships. Client-led, ICF-aligned, and clearly bounded.

hero.title: Services that meet you where you are
hero.subtitle: Choose the format that fits your transition. All offers are ICF-aligned, bilingual, and co-designed so you stay in consent.

oneToOne.title: 1:1 Coaching
oneToOne.summary: Dedicated space to explore goals, identity, and experiments without judgement.
for: Professionals navigating relocation, career shifts, or integration into UK workplaces.
Leaders balancing multicultural teams or stakeholder expectations.
Individuals returning from a career break who want steady accountability.
focus: Clarifying values, strengths, and desired impact.
Designing experiments to test new roles, industries, or ways of working.
Building confidence in bilingual communication and boundary setting.
format: Virtual sessions via secure video calls, with optional in-person intensives in London subject to availability.
Optional reflection prompts or voice-note check-ins between sessions (only with your consent).
oneToOne.languages: Available in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, or a blend.
oneToOne.boundaries: Coaching is not therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice. We will signpost other professionals if that support is needed.

clinics.title: Small-group coaching clinics
clinics.summary: Gentle group spaces (4–6 people) for shared learning while keeping individual agency.
for: Employee resource groups or community circles wanting culturally aware facilitation.
Teams preparing for change, such as restructures or international moves.
Universities or incubators supporting graduates and founders with reflective practice.
focus: Creating peer support agreements and shared language for wellbeing.
Exploring complex transitions through coaching-style questions and exercises.
Designing experiments each participant can adapt to their own context.
format: Hosted online; on-site delivery in the UK available with travel costs covered.
Includes optional bilingual resources and summaries for participants.
clinics.languages: Delivered in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, or bilingual formats.
clinics.boundaries: Clinics remain coaching spaces, not training or therapy. Participation is always voluntary, and safeguarding protocols are agreed upfront.

organisations.title: Support for organisations
organisations.summary: Consultation-light partnerships to embed coaching practices across multicultural teams.
for: People and culture teams wanting to offer bilingual coaching access.
Leaders planning responsible change or return-to-work pathways.
Non-profits and social enterprises supporting diaspora communities.
focus: Scoping coaching programmes aligned with ICF ethics and organisational policies.
Designing reflective workshops for managers and team leads.
Developing referral pathways and safeguarding agreements.
format: Discovery sessions to understand needs and consent requirements.
Co-created proposals outlining objectives, language mix, and evaluation rhythms.
Quarterly reviews to adjust or close the partnership responsibly.
organisations.languages: Materials and delivery available in English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese.
organisations.boundaries: We do not replace internal HR, legal, or mental health services. We collaborate with your specialists to keep scope clear.

howWeWork.title: How we work together
howWeWork.intro: Every engagement begins with informed consent and clear agreements.
steps: Chemistry chat to understand goals, language preferences, and accessibility needs.
Written agreement covering scope, confidentiality, fees, cancellation policy, and safeguarding exceptions.
Regular reviews to celebrate learning, adjust the plan, or conclude when the work is complete.

pricing.title: Pricing notes
pricing.intro: We price transparently and offer sliding scales where possible.
notes: Rates are quoted in GBP and shared after the chemistry chat based on the agreed scope.
Discounted places are reserved for community organisers, jobseekers, and self-funded individuals on lower incomes.
Invoices include clear payment timelines, data handling practices, and cancellation terms.

cta.title: Start with a conversation
cta.body: Share what you are navigating and we will suggest formats—or signpost alternatives—so you can choose the support that fits.
